bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Alexandria County was formed from Fairfax County in 1789. The area became a part of the District of Columbia in 1801. Congress returned Alexandria County to Virginia in 1846. The county's name was changed to Arlington County in 1920.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Alexandria County (Va.) Circuit Court Records Records, 1868-1898, consist of miscellaneous court papers, most of which are related to criminal cases.
